Title: L'udienza
Writer: Marco Ferreri (story), Rafael Azcona (story), Marco Ferreri (screenplay), Dante Matelli (screenplay)
Actors: Enzo Jannacci, Claudia Cardinale, Ugo Tognazzi, Michel Piccoli
Plot: A young man from north Italy named Amedeo decides to come to Rome.He has a crazy idea in his head to meet the pope.
